title: Thaarumaaru ThakkaliSoru Lyrics Veera Sivaji Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Veera Sivaji Thaarumaaru Song Lyrics
Music: D Imman
Lyrics: Rokesh
Singers: STR, Maria Roe Vincent

Thaaru maaru
Thakkali soru
Thakkaali soru Thakkaali soru

En aala paaru
Pappaali tholu
Pappaali tholu Pappaali tholu

Nachchunu narrukunnu
Poranthuta nee enaku

Takkunu Thalukunu
Valanthutan naa unaku

White-u wine unna
Usharu dhaan panna

Theeturende kanna-u
Thirumbi paaru enna

Smiley aana mayilu
Nee nadunthu vandhaa style-u
Kurala kettaa kuyilu
Nee Kuliru kaalathu veyil-u


Thaaru maaru
Thakkaali soru
Thakkaali soru Thakkaali soru

En aala paaru
Pappaali tholu
Pappaali tholu Pappaali tholu

(Rap portions...)

Vaanavillaa Varusham fulla
Cute-u queen-u coloru fulla

Yedhura vandhu sedharavittaa
Bayandha payyana padharavittaa

Ava plattinatha urrukithaan
Varicha selai
Enna pattaa kaththi paarvaiyaale
Seiyuraa kolai

Rottul nadakum rose-u dhaan
Azhagula ava maass-u dhaan
Angel energy juice dhaan

En first love aavuma 
Paassu dhaan

Thaaru maaru Thaaru maaru ....

Thaaru maaru
Thakkaali soru
Thakkaali soru Thakkaali soru

En aala paaru
Pappaali tholu
Pappaali tholu Pappaali tholu

Nachchunu narrukunnu
Poranthuta nee enaku

Takkunu Thalukunu
Valanthutan naa unaku

White-u wine unna
Usharu dhaan panna

Theeturende kanna-u
Thirumbi paaru enna

Smiley aana mayilu
Nee nadunthu vandhaa style-u
Kurala kettaa kuyilu
Nee Kuliru kaalathu veyil-u

Ultimate tomato rice..
Tomato rice... Tomato rice..
